00265     // This function shouldn't required but it seems that VC7.1 have an optimisation bug if this operator wasn't declared
00266     template <typename T> 
00267     inline _xvec4<T>& _xvec4<T>::operator=(const glm::_xvec4<T>& x)
00268     {
00269         this->x = x.x;
00270         this->y = x.y;
00271         this->z = x.z;
00272         this->w = x.w;
00273         return *this;
00274     }

00397     template <typename T> 
00398     inline _xvec4<T> _xvec4<T>::operator* (const _xmat4<T>& m) const
00399     {
00400         return _xvec4<T>(
00401             m[0][0] * this->x + m[0][1] * this->y + m[0][2] * this->z + m[0][3] * this->w,
00402             m[1][0] * this->x + m[1][1] * this->y + m[1][2] * this->z + m[1][3] * this->w,
00403             m[2][0] * this->x + m[2][1] * this->y + m[2][2] * this->z + m[2][3] * this->w,
00404             m[3][0] * this->x + m[3][1] * this->y + m[3][2] * this->z + m[3][3] * this->w);
00405     }
00406 
00407     template <typename T> 
00408     inline _xvec4<T>& _xvec4<T>::operator*= (const _xmat4<T>& m)
00409     {
00410         return *this = *this * m;
00411     }

00658     // This function shouldn't required but it seems that VC7.1 have an optimisation bug if this operator wasn't declared
00659     inline _bvec4& _bvec4::operator=(const _bvec4& x)
00660     {
00661         this->x = x.x;
00662         this->y = x.y;
00663         this->z = x.z;
00664         this->w = x.w;
00665         return *this;
00666     }
00667 
00668     inline _bvec4 _bvec4::operator--()
00669     {
00670             this->x = !x;
00671             this->y = !y;
00672         this->z = !z;
00673         this->w = !w;
00674             return *this;
00675     }
00676 
00677     inline _bvec4 _bvec4::operator++()
00678     {
00679             this->x = !x;
00680             this->y = !y;
00681         this->z = !z;
00682         this->w = !w;
00683             return *this;
00684     }
00685 
00686     inline const _bvec4 _bvec4::operator--(int n) const 
00687     {
00688                 return _bvec4(
00689                         !this->x, 
00690                         !this->y, 
00691                         !this->z, 
00692                         !this->w);
00693     }

00696     {

00698                         !this->x, 
00699                         !this->y, 
00700                         !this->z, 
00701                         !this->w);
00702     }
